meanings.definition: Not made hard or rigid by the deposition of calcium salts.
meanings.sent1: The uncalcified jellyfish had a soft and flexible body.
meanings.sent2: The uncalcified bone was still pliable and not yet hardened.
meanings.sent3: The uncalcified cookie dough was easy to mold into different shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her uncalcified heart remained open and unaffected by life's challenges.
meanings.sent5: The uncalcified clay was perfect for sculpting intricate details.

meanings.sent1: The uncalcified teeth were prone to decay without proper care.
meanings.sent2: The uncalcified arteries were clear of any blockages.
meanings.sent3: The uncalcified seashells were surprisingly lightweight.
meanings.sent4: Her uncalcified hair shone with natural health and vitality.
meanings.sent5: The uncalcified soil allowed plants to grow freely without restriction.
